name: codeforces-problem-search
title: Codeforces Problem Search
description: Fetch all details of a problem from codeforces using the problem id or problem name.
author: Mehul

commands.name: search-problem
commands.title: Search Problem
commands.description: Searches for a problem on codeforces.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
